name: Mai Stablecoin
description: MAI, or miMatic, is a stablecoin backed by locked collateral launched by Mai Finance. The price of MAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new MAI is minted.
